alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Dale; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 5:41PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Dale, east central Coffee and northwestern Houston Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 541 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Fort Rucker to near Daleville. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Daleville, Dothan, Enterprise, Fort Rucker, Ozark, Taylor, Midland City, Level Plains, Cowarts, Newton, Pinckard, Clayhatchee, Grimes, Napier Field, Hunt Field, Waterford, Hooper Stage Field, Gerald, Ewell and Cairns Aaf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
